021import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
022import net.tnemc.core.account.GeyserAccount;
023import net.tnemc.core.account.NonPlayerAccount;
024import net.tnemc.core.account.PlayerAccount;
025import net.tnemc.core.account.SharedAccount;
026import net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.HoldingsEntry;
027import net.tnemc.core.config.DataConfig;
028import net.tnemc.core.io.storage.datables.sql.standard.SQLAccount;
029import net.tnemc.core.io.storage.datables.sql.standard.SQLHoldings;
030import net.tnemc.core.io.storage.datables.sql.standard.SQLReceipt;
031import net.tnemc.core.io.storage.datables.yaml.YAMLAccount;
032import net.tnemc.core.io.storage.datables.yaml.YAMLHoldings;
033import net.tnemc.core.io.storage.datables.yaml.YAMLReceipt;
034import net.tnemc.core.io.storage.dialect.TNEDialect;
035import net.tnemc.core.io.storage.dialect.impl.MariaDialect;
036import net.tnemc.core.io.storage.dialect.impl.MariaOutdatedDialect;
037import net.tnemc.core.io.storage.dialect.impl.MySQLDialect;
038import net.tnemc.core.io.storage.dialect.impl.MySQLRevampDialect;
039import net.tnemc.core.transaction.Receipt;
040import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
041import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.log.DebugLevel;
042import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.scheduler.ChoreExecution;
043import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.scheduler.ChoreTime;
044import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.Datable;
045import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.StorageConnector;
046import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.StorageEngine;
047import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.StorageProvider;
048import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.connect.SQLConnector;
049import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.connect.YAMLConnector;
050import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.engine.StandardSQL;
051import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.engine.flat.YAML;
052import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.engine.sql.MariaDB;
053import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.engine.sql.MySQL;
054import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.engine.sql.PostgreSQL;
055import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
056
057import java.util.Optional;
058
059/**
060 * TNEStorageProvider
061 *
062 * @author creatorfromhell
063 * @since 0.1.2.0
064 */
065public class TNEStorageProvider implements StorageProvider {
066
067  private StorageEngine engine;
068  private StorageConnector<?> connector;
069
070  @Override
071  public void initialize(final String engine) {
072
073    final String prefix = DataConfig.yaml().getString("Data.Database.Prefix");
074
075    boolean maria = false;
076
077    try {
078      Class.forName("org.mariadb.jdbc.Driver");
079      maria = true;
080    } catch(final Exception ignore) { }
081
082    try {
083      Class.forName("org.mariadb.jdbc.MariaDbDataSource");
084      maria = true;
085    } catch(final Exception ignore) { }
086
087    switch(engine.toLowerCase()) {
088      case "mysql" -> {
089
090        if(maria) {
091          this.engine = new MariaDB(prefix, new MariaDialect(prefix));
092          this.connector = new SQLConnector();
093          break;
094        }
095        this.engine = new MySQL(prefix, new MySQLDialect(prefix));
096        this.connector = new SQLConnector();
097      }
098      case "maria", "mariadb" -> {
099
100        if(maria) {
101          this.engine = new MariaDB(prefix, new MariaDialect(prefix));
102          this.connector = new SQLConnector();
103          break;
104        }
105
106        this.engine = new MySQL(prefix, new MariaDialect(prefix));
107        this.connector = new SQLConnector();
108      }
109      case "maria-outdated" -> {
110        PluginCore.log().warning("Using outdated database! Please note: Official Support for this version of TNE is limited.", DebugLevel.OFF);
111
112        if(maria) {
113          this.engine = new MariaDB(prefix, new MariaOutdatedDialect(prefix));
114          this.connector = new SQLConnector();
115          break;
116        }
117
118        this.engine = new MySQL(prefix, new MariaOutdatedDialect(prefix));
119        this.connector = new SQLConnector();
120      }
121      case "postgre" -> {
122        this.engine = new PostgreSQL(new MySQLDialect(prefix));
123        this.connector = new SQLConnector();
124      }
125      case "mysql-revamp" -> {
126        if(maria) {
127          this.engine = new MariaDB(prefix, new MySQLRevampDialect(prefix));
128          this.connector = new SQLConnector();
129          break;
130        }
131
132        this.engine = new MySQL(prefix, new MySQLRevampDialect(prefix));
133        this.connector = new SQLConnector();
134      }
135      default -> {
136        this.engine = new YAML();
137        this.connector = new YAMLConnector();
138      }
139    }
140
141    final Datable<Account> account = (this.engine instanceof StandardSQL)? new SQLAccount() : new YAMLAccount();
142    final Datable<HoldingsEntry> entry = (this.engine instanceof StandardSQL)? new SQLHoldings() : new YAMLHoldings();
143    final Datable<Receipt> receipt = (this.engine instanceof StandardSQL)? new SQLReceipt() : new YAMLReceipt();
144
145    this.engine.datables().put(Account.class, account);
146    this.engine.datables().put(NonPlayerAccount.class, account);
147    this.engine.datables().put(SharedAccount.class, account);
148    this.engine.datables().put(GeyserAccount.class, account);
149    this.engine.datables().put(PlayerAccount.class, account);
150
151    this.engine.datables().put(HoldingsEntry.class, entry);
152    this.engine.datables().put(Receipt.class, receipt);
153  }
154
155  @Override
156  public StorageConnector<?> connector() {
157
158    return this.connector;
159  }
160
161  @Override
162  public StorageEngine engine() {
163
164    return this.engine;
165  }
166
167  @Override
168  public void initialize() {
169
170    if(connector instanceof final SQLConnector sql
171       && this.engine instanceof final StandardSQL sqlEngine
172       && sqlEngine.dialect() instanceof final TNEDialect tneDialect) {
173
174      sql.executeUpdate(tneDialect.accountsTable(), new Object[]{});
175      sql.executeUpdate(tneDialect.accountsNonPlayerTable(), new Object[]{});
176      sql.executeUpdate(tneDialect.accountsPlayerTable(), new Object[]{});
177      sql.executeUpdate(tneDialect.accountMembersTable(), new Object[]{});
178      sql.executeUpdate(tneDialect.holdingsTable(), new Object[]{});
179      sql.executeUpdate(tneDialect.receiptsTable(), new Object[]{});
180      sql.executeUpdate(tneDialect.receiptsHoldingsTable(), new Object[]{});
181      sql.executeUpdate(tneDialect.receiptsParticipantsTable(), new Object[]{});
182      sql.executeUpdate(tneDialect.receiptsModifiersTable(), new Object[]{});
183    }
184  }
185
186  @Override
187  public void storeAll(@NotNull final String identifier) {
188
189    final Optional<Datable<?>> data = Optional.ofNullable(engine.datables().get(HoldingsEntry.class));
190
191    //Our account storeAll requires no identifier, so we set it to null
192    data.ifPresent(datable->datable.storeAll(connector, identifier));
193  }
194
195  @Override
196  public void storeAll() {
197
198    final Optional<Datable<?>> data = Optional.ofNullable(engine.datables().get(Account.class));
199
200    //Our account storeAll requires no identifier, so we set it to null
201    data.ifPresent(datable->PluginCore.server().scheduler()
202            .createDelayedTask(()->datable.storeAll(connector, null), new ChoreTime(0), ChoreExecution.SECONDARY));
203
204
205    final Optional<Datable<?>> receiptData = Optional.ofNullable(engine.datables().get(Receipt.class));
206
207    //Our account storeAll requires no identifier, so we set it to null
208    receiptData.ifPresent(datable->PluginCore.server().scheduler()
209            .createDelayedTask(()->datable.storeAll(connector, null), new ChoreTime(0), ChoreExecution.SECONDARY));
210  }
211
212  @Override
213  public void purge() {
214
215  }
216
217  @Override
218  public void reset() {
219
220    TNECore.eco().clearCache();
221  }
222
223  @Override
224  public void backup() {
225
226  }
227}
